name: Unstable climb
description:
Unstable climb

This mountain hide a lot of trap, try to climb it without falling !

Controls : 
  • Move : W,A,S,D or Arrow key
  • A : Alt, J or Z
  • B : Ctrl, K or X
  • Start : Enter
  • Select : Shft

This is my first project with GB Studio.

This is also my submission for the Ludum Dare 49. Follow this link if you want to rate my game : https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/unstable-climb

EDIT : I've fix the reload error
